titleStmt.title: A sermon of nobilitie· Preached at VVhite-hall, before the King in February 1606. By George Meriton Doctor of Diuinity, one of his Maiesties chaplaines in ordinary; and parson of Hadleigh in Suffolke.
titleStmt.author: Meriton, George, d. 1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By George Eld] for Thomas Clarke, and are to be sold at the signe of the Angell in Saint Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
